item.title: Sources
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

gtsman:

i have no idea what u talk about anybody know easier way?

There is no “easier way”. You HAVE to do it this way, otherwise it will not work at all. If you expect to become good at programming/private servers, you’re going to need to accept that in some cases the only way to do something is the hard way.

Anyways, I dug around there for you, and found this:

[quote=“My Guide, Page 7”][quote]‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

umm, this one might take a little explanation:

first, write right (sorry, staying up late does that to me) click “My Computer” then click “Properties”. now click the “Advanced” tab, then down at the bottom click “Environment Variables”. under the “User variables for Owner” section, click “New”.

Variable Name:

Classpath

Variable value:

SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.

almost done, now click “Ok”, then make another “New” with this info:

Variable Name:

Path

Variable value:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin

now just click “Ok”, “Ok”, then “Apply” (only if it’s available, it it’s just faded out, don’t worry) then “Ok” again[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Sources
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

gtsman:

i checked the page of moparscape 31 w/t aryan at downloadas and hybrid has been build in it omg[br][size=1]Posted at: October 03, 2006, 03:31:22 AM[/size][hr]someone help[br][size=1]Posted at: October 03, 2006, 05:13:11 AM[/size][hr]omg i want fucking help

First, please chill out. Being mad doesn’t do jack shit to fix the problem.

On to your question: You have to download the source for the server, and then you need to set-up your Environment Variables. If you don’t know how to do that, read through some of the comments on my guide, because I know for a fact I explained it once or twice in there. It’s not on the first page though; you’ll have to do some digging.

Read full topic

well do you have hamachi? if you do find another server with hamachi put the network name in and then the pass.

for example: nework name:jimbobfred and then the pass:poop and then when u joined that server you just add the hamachi ip of the server admin. their ip will be right nest to there name. add there ip in were it says ip and then join server it should work if not i duno
